#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation,Phase-Deploy
== Chart examples adapted from the Google examples taken from the wrapper module unit tests ==
=== Title ===
{{{
# Title using name with optional color and size
G = GChart('lc',['beautifulisbetterthanuglyexplicitisbetterthanimplicitsimpleisbetterthancomplexcomplexisbetterthancomplicated'])
G.title('The Zen of Python','00cc00',36)
G.color('00cc00')
}}}
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chd=s:beautifulisbetterthanuglyexplicitisbetterthanimplicitsimpleisbetterthancomplexcomplexisbetterthancomplicated&chco=00cc00&chts=00cc00,36&chs=300x150&cht=lc&chtt=The+Zen+of+Python&.png

=== Line ===
{{{
# Add red line 6 thick
# with 5 line segments with 2 blank segments
G = GChart('lc',['helloWorld'])
G.axes.type('xy')
G.axes.label(0,'Mar','Apr','May','June','July')
G.axes.label(1,None,'50+Kb')
G.color('ff0000')
G.line(6,5,2)
}}}
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chxt=x,y&chs=300x150&chd=s:helloWorld&chxl=0:|Mar|Apr|May|June|July|1:||50+Kb&cht=lc&chls=6.0,5.0,2.0&chco=ff0000&.png

=== Bar ===
{{{
# 2 color horizontal bars 10 wide
# with 5 spacing between bars in group and 10 between groups
G = GChart('bhg', ['hell','orld'])
G.color('cc0000', '00aa00')
G.bar(10,5,10)
}}}
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chco=cc0000,00aa00&chd=s:hell,orld&chs=300x150&cht=bhg&chbh=10,5,10&.png

=== Pie ===
{{{
# Simple pie chart based on range
G = GChart('p3', range(1,5))
G.label('A','B','C','D')
G.color('00dd00')
}}}
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chco=00dd00&chd=s:Pfu9&chs=300x150&cht=p3&chl=A|B|C|D&.png

=== Venn ===
{{{
# Simple venn diagram based on int list
G = GChart('v', [100,80,60,30,30,30,10])
}}}
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chd=s:9xlSSSG&chs=300x150&cht=v&.png

=== Axes ===
{{{
# Labels reference axes type (chxt=x,y,r,x) as do styles
G = GChart('lc',['foobarbaz'])
G.color('76A4FB')
G.axes.type('xyrx')
G.axes.label(0,'Foo','Bar','Baz')
G.axes.label(1,'0','100')
G.axes.label(2,'A','B','C')
G.axes.style(0,'0000dd',14)
}}}
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chxt=x,y,r,x&chs=300x150&chd=s:foobarbaz&chxs=0,0000dd,14&chxl=0:|Foo|Bar|Baz|1:|0|100|2:|A|B|C&cht=lc&chco=76A4FB&.png

=== Grid ===
{{{
# Create dashed line with grid x,y as floats
# then, just like line, the line and blank segments
G = GChart('lc',['foobarbaz'])
G.color('76A4FB')
G.line(3,6,3)
G.grid(20.0,25.0,1,0)
}}}
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chd=s:foobarbaz&chg=20.0,25.0,1.0,0.0&chco=76A4FB&chs=300x150&cht=lc&chls=3.0,6.0,3.0&.png

=== Markers ===
{{{
# Mark up some of the data randomly
G = GChart('lc',['helloWorld'])
G.marker('c','ff0000',0,3,20)
G.marker('d','00ff00',0,6,15)
G.marker('a','000099',0,4,10)
G.marker('R','A0BAE9',0,8,0.6)
G.marker('r','E5ECF9',0,1,0.25)
}}}
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chd=s:helloWorld&chs=300x150&cht=lc&chm=c,ff0000,0,3,20|d,00ff00,0,6,15|a,000099,0,4,10|R,A0BAE9,0,8,0.6|r,E5ECF9,0,1,0.25&.png

=== Fill ===
{{{
# Fill the chart areas
G = GChart('lc',['99','cefhjkqwrlgYcfgc','QSSVXXdkfZUMRTUQ','HJJMOOUbVPKDHKLH','AA'])
G.marker('b','76A4FB',0,1,0)
G.marker('b','224499',1,2,0)
G.marker('b','FF0000',2,3,0)
G.marker('B','80C65A',3,4,0)
}}}
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chd=s:99,cefhjkqwrlgYcfgc,QSSVXXdkfZUMRTUQ,HJJMOOUbVPKDHKLH,AA&chs=300x150&cht=lc&chm=b,76A4FB,0,1,0|b,224499,1,2,0|b,FF0000,2,3,0|B,80C65A,3,4,0&.png

=== Legend ===
{{{
# Add legend to the data set which follows collors
G = GChart('lc',['FOETHECat','leafgreen','IRON4YOUs'])
G.color('ff0000','00ff00','0000ff')
G.legend('Animals','Vegetables','Minerals')
G.axes.type('xy')
G.axes.label(1,None,'20K','60K','100K')
}}}
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chxt=x,y&chs=300x150&chd=s:FOETHECat,leafgreen,IRON4YOUs&chxl=1:||20K|60K|100K&cht=lc&chco=ff0000,00ff00,0000ff&chdl=Animals|Vegetables|Minerals&.png
